alert.note: Alert for East Carteret; Hatteras Island; Mainland Dare; Mainland Hyde; Northern Outer Banks; Ocracoke Island; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 08 at 3:42PM EST until January 10 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM TUESDAY TO 1 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Mainland Dare, Mainland Hyde, West Carteret and East Carteret Counties, and Northern Outer Banks, Ocracoke Island and Hatteras Island. * WHEN...From 4 PM Tuesday to 1 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: East Carteret; Hatteras Island; Mainland Dare; Mainland Hyde; Northern Outer Banks; Ocracoke Island; West Carteret
